channel.title: covid on Gabe Kangas
channel.description: Recent content in covid on Gabe Kangas

item.title: A personal update about career and the future
item.description: Before COVID hit I was about three years into working at a pretty cool company as an iOS engineer. I joined the company before the product launched and had a great time. But like things do, sometimes you grow apart when the company gets bigger and priorities change. So at the point everyone started working from home full time it became increasingly more difficult and I decided to leave the company.
